verses.name: Ezekiel 16:34
verses.text: And the contrary is in thee from other women in thy whoredoms, whereas none followeth thee to commit whoredoms: and in that thou givest a reward, and no reward is given unto thee, therefore thou art contrary.

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:35
verses.text: Wherefore, O harlot, hear the word of the Lord:

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:36
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; Because thy filthiness was poured out, and thy nakedness discovered through thy whoredoms with thy lovers, and with all the idols of thy abominations, and by the blood of thy children, which thou didst give unto them;
